sentences.en: ‘Look, I can’t tell you.’ ‘Oh, come on, give me a hint .’
sentences.cn: “听着，我不能告诉你。”“得了，给我一点暗示吧。”

sentences.en: ‘Look, I can’t tell you.’ ‘Oh, come on, give me a hint.’
sentences.cn: “听着，我不能告诉你。”“得了，给我一点暗示吧。”

sentences.en: "I think I hear the telephone ringing."—"Okay, I can take a hint."
sentences.cn: “我想我听到电话铃在响。”——“好的，我明白你的意思了。”

sentences.en: "What a pity," Graham said with a hint of sarcasm.
sentences.cn: “太遗憾了，”格雷厄姆略带挖苦地说道。

sentences.en: Diana took the hint and left them to it.
sentences.cn: 戴安娜会意，任由他们自己去解决。

sentences.en: He quickly took the hint.
sentences.cn: 一点他就明白了.

sentences.en: He was closemouthed and didn't drop a hint.
sentences.cn: 他嘴很紧,不透一点风.

sentences.en: I made it clear I wasn’t interested in him, but he didn’t take the hint .
sentences.cn: 我清楚地表明我对他不感兴趣，但他不明白我的意思。

sentences.en: Maria loved both the children. There was never a hint of favouritism.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚对两个孩子都疼爱有加，向来一视同仁。

sentences.en: She added only a hint of vermouth to the gin.
sentences.cn: 她只在杜松子酒里加了少许苦艾酒。

sentences.en: She hinted at the possibility of a treat of some sort.
sentences.cn: 她暗示可以找找乐子什么的。

sentences.en: she tried to put him off but he didn't take the hint.
sentences.cn: 她想要让他下车，但他没领会她的暗示。

sentences.en: She'd never received the merest hint of any communication from him.
sentences.cn: 她从未得到他准备沟通的一丁点儿暗示。

sentences.en: There have been hints that he may take up coaching.
sentences.cn: 他暗示过可能会出任教练。

sentences.en: There was a hint of accusation in her voice.
sentences.cn: 她的话音中暗含指责的意思.

sentences.en: There was a hint of impatience in his tone.
sentences.cn: 他的语气中透出些不耐烦。

sentences.en: There was a hint of schoolboy shyness in his explanation.
sentences.cn: 他的解释中带有一丝学生的羞涩。

sentences.en: There was not a hint of badness in him.
sentences.cn: 他道德十分高尚。

sentences.en: There's a subtle hint of garlic in the sauce.
sentences.cn: 调味汁里稍微有一点蒜味.

sentences.en: They neglect their duty at the least hint of fun elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 别处哪怕发生一丁点儿乐事，他们便会忘记自己的职责。

sentences.en: This is a full - bodied wine with just a hint of sweetness.
sentences.cn: 这是一种味道醇厚的葡萄酒,只有一丝甜味.

phrases.tran_cn: 领会别人的暗示；接受暗示

trans.tran_cn: 线索，迹象，提示，注意事项，暗示，微量
trans.tran_en: something that you say or do to suggest something to someone, without telling them directly
something that you say or do to suggest something to someone, without telling them directly
to suggest something in an indirect way, but so that someone can guess your meaning
